dct_title_s: Africa with all its states, kingdoms, republics, regions, islands, & ca., improved and inlarged from D'Anville's map ; to which have been added a particular chart of the Gold Coast wherein are distinguished all the European forts and factories
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. With descriptive text. Insets: A particular chart of the Gold Coat. -- Azores or Western Islands. Detached from T. Kitchin's General atlas? cf. Phillips, P.L. List of geographical atlases, no. 4295, 4300.
